product_name: Ibex Shak Lite Half-Zip Sweater - Men's
long_description: Some sweaters live a boring life of business meetings and stuffy social gatherings, but not the Ibex Shak Lite half-zip. It prefers to spend time on alpine peaks, rugged trails and rocky ocean shores. Made of soft, U.S.-sourced Rambouillet merino wool, this sweater insulates, wicks away moisture and breathes-naturally. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Half-zip front allows easy on and off; interior chin guard protects your skin from the zipper. Zippered pocket on the left sleeve. The Ibex Shak Lite Half-Zip sweater has a semifitted cut.
short_description: Some sweaters live a boring life of business meetings and stuffy social gatherings, but not the Ibex Shak Lite half-zip. It prefers to spend time on alpine peaks, rugged trails and rocky ocean shores.
